name: T cells 0
description: Day 1: Isolate T cells from OT-1 mice using T cell enrichment column and transfer 5-6 X 10<sup>6</sup> cells intravenously into CD45.1 mice.

name: MDSC 0
description: Isolate MDSC from 3 week  tumor-bearing mice \(EL4 or MC38) using biotin-Gr-1 and streptavidin beads \(Miltenyi biotech, CA) antibody and  transfer 4-5 X 10<sup>6</sup> cells intravenously into mice which have received OT-1 T cells.

name: SIINFEKL peptide 0
description: Immunize mice with SIINFEKL peptide 100 ug in 100 ul PBS plus 100 ul of incomplete Freund’s adjuvant.

name: single cell suspension 0
description: Harvest spleens from mice and prepare a single cell suspension.

name: supernatant 0
description: Pellet the cells by centrifugation \(1700 RPM 5 min) at room temperature \(RT) and aspirate the supernatant.

name: supernatant 1
description: 3. Resuspend the pellet in 5 ml/spleen of ACK Lysis Buffer.

name: supernatant 2
description: 4. Incubate at RT for 4-5 minutes with occasional shaking.

name: supernatant 3
description:
5. Stop the reaction by adding 40-50 μl of PBS. 
  6.

name: cells 0
description: Wash the cells with PBS twice \(1700 RPM  5 min) at RT.

name: Cy5 labeled MHC-Ig dimer 0
description: 8. Prepare a serial dilution \(2000 nM – 12.5 nM) of 20 μl of Cy5 labeled MHC-Ig dimer in a FACS tube.

name: cells 1
description:
Adjust cells to a concentration of 10<sup>7</sup> cells/ml in FACS wash buffer 
  10.

name: Cy5 labeled MHC-Ig dimer 1
description: Add 10 ul aliquot of cells to the FACS tube with the MHC-Ig dimer.

name: cells 2
description: Incubate cells with the MHC-Ig dimers for 60-90 min on ice.

name: cells 3
description: Without any washing add FITC labeled anti-CD8 and PE labeled anti-CD45.1 antibodies to each aliquot.

name: cells 2 1
description: Incubate cells for an additional 20 min on ice and wash two times before flow cytometric analysis.
